info.title: 9to5-Scout API
info.description: AI-powered job discovery and career assistance platform with comprehensive job scraping, agent-based resume optimization, and email routing capabilities.

context_tasks.description: Array of task IDs this task depends on

task_sequence.description: Array of task IDs in execution order

monitored_job_id.description: Linked job ID when sourced from monitored jobs
ID of the monitored job that initiated this scrape

source.description: Origin of the log entry (e.g. worker or python)

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: Job ID

200.description: Job tracking timeline with snapshots and changes

get.summary: Get snapshot content from R2 storage

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: Job ID

parameters.name: snapshotId
parameters.description: Snapshot ID

parameters.name: type
parameters.description: Content type to retrieve

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: Job ID

get.summary: Get list of jobs that need monitoring

parameters.name: limit
parameters.description: Maximum number of jobs to return

post.summary: Add URLs to the scrape queue

urls.description: Single URL string or array of URLs to scrape

parameters.name: limit
parameters.description: Maximum number of jobs to claim

get.summary: List queue items missing job details

parameters.name: limit
parameters.description: Maximum number of queue items to return

parameters.name: limit
parameters.description: Maximum number of monitored jobs to return

parameters.name: search
parameters.description: Full-text search string applied to message and payload.

parameters.name: source
parameters.description: Comma-separated list of sources to include.

parameters.name: log_level
parameters.description: Comma-separated log levels to include (e.g. INFO,ERROR).

parameters.name: request_id
parameters.description: Filter logs by request or trace identifier.

parameters.name: has_payload
parameters.description: If true, only logs with payloads are returned. If false, only logs without payloads are returned.

parameters.name: start
parameters.description: Filter logs captured after this timestamp.

parameters.name: end
parameters.description: Filter logs captured before this timestamp.

parameters.name: order_by
parameters.description: Column used for ordering the results.

parameters.name: order_direction
parameters.description: Sort direction for the ordered column.

parameters.name: limit
parameters.description: Maximum number of log entries to return.

parameters.name: offset
parameters.description: Offset used for pagination.

parameters.name: q
parameters.description: Search query for semantic job matching

post.summary: Submit job history for AI processing

raw_content.description: Job history content in any format (plaintext, markdown, JSON, etc.)

get.summary: Get applicant's job history and profile

parameters.name: user_id
parameters.description: Unique identifier for the applicant

job_id.description: Job ID to rate fit against
